name: stylish bandana
notes:
**this is a pay what you want pattern! use the code bandana50 for 50% off the original price or use the code bandana100 for a free copy. if you download for free, i’d love it if you gave this pattern a ❤️. thank you for your support!

welcome to the stylish bandana pattern! this simple yet chic accessory is the perfect project for crocheters of all skill levels, especially beginners. with a soothing, open stitch design, this bandana is both relaxing to make and wear. it works up quickly, making it a great choice for last-minute gifts or a personal wardrobe update. whether you're looking to add a touch of style to your outfit or just want a cozy, lightweight piece to wear, this bandana has got you covered. let’s dive into this easy and fun project that will have you wearing your beautiful creation in no time!

this bandana is made using dk weight yarn and a 5mm hook. it works beautifully with any plant-based fiber or colorway, allowing the texture and tone of the yarn to really shine. the design is crocheted seamlessly from the tip upward to the wide edge, where simple ties are added to each side—no seaming required!

quick to make, this project takes about one to two hours to complete. the pattern includes two sizes: adult (l) and child (s, for children under ten). it's easy to customize by adjusting the number of rows—add more for a larger size or fewer for a smaller fit. size options will appear as: s (l). if only one number is given, it applies to both sizes.

this is a beginner-friendly pattern that uses only basic stitches. a step-by-step photo tutorial is included at the end of the written instructions, along with video links for any special techniques used.
